name: @zabaca/lattice
description: Human-initiated, AI-powered knowledge graph for markdown documentation

scripts.build: bun build src/main.ts --outdir dist --target bun --packages external
scripts.release:patch: bun run check && bun test && bun pm version patch && git push && git push --tags && bun publish
scripts.release:minor: bun run check && bun test && bun pm version minor && git push && git push && bun publish
scripts.release:major: bun run check && bun test && bun pm version major && git push && git push && bun publish

author: Zabaca
